pages.title: Hecate's Blessing
pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 3 $(li)Treasure = False $(li)Tradeable = False $(li)Rarity = Uncommon $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: During night, increases attacks speed such as draw speed

pages.title: Transcended
pages.text: Required Level = 200 $(br2)Attack speed and draw speed are increased exponentially
